Module fi.tuni.prog3.sisu
Package fi.tuni.prog3.sisu

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.sisu.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Controller extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controls the main UI-window and its elements. Is responsible for program functionality. Controls mainGUI.fxml.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL arg0, ResourceBundle arg1)
      Initializes the UI and performs necessary actions.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      arg0 - unused
      arg1 - unused

    • selectItem

      public void selectItem()
      Shows info based on selected element and toggles the visibility of "course completed" checkbox. Checks if clicked element is a course and sets checkbox visibility by it. NOTE: Not every element has info that can be fetched.

    • checkBoxOnClick

      public void checkBoxOnClick()
      "Completes" course Gives the Student-object a course key and sets visible credits to TreeView TreeItem. Lastly refreshes the completed studies part of the UI view.

    • refreshStudiesCompleted

      public void refreshStudiesCompleted()
      Refreshes the comleted studies part of the UI. Adds completed courses to a VBOX and adds credits to the allCredits Text element.

    • save

      public void save()
      Saves current Student by using methods from SaveProgress. Catches IOException if given file is not valid.

    • load

      public void load()
      Loads Student object from file, replaces the current Student. Catches FileNotFoundException if given file doesn't exist. Lastly refreshes the completed studies part of the UI view.

    • switchDegree

      public void switchDegree()
      Switches the current degree shown in UI and sets it for the current Student. NOTE: Switching degrees will reset the Students credits and courses done. Lastly refreshes the completed studies part of the UI view.

    • getNewMotivationalImage

      public void getNewMotivationalImage()
      Refreshs the motivational image shown on the tab "motivaatio". Image is AI generated by https://inspirobot.me/.

    • setDegrees

      public static void setDegrees(HashMap<String,Degree> degrees)
      Parameters:
      degrees - HashMap containing String keys and Degree degrees to set.

    • setStudent

      public static void setStudent(Student student)
      Parameters:
      student - Student-object to be set onto the Controller.

    • setDegree

      public static void setDegree(Degree degree)
      Parameters:
      degree - Degree-object to be set onto the Controller.

    • setSelectedElement

      public static void setSelectedElement(String element)
      Parameters:
      element - String element to be set onto the Controller.

    • addCourses

      public static void addCourses(Course c)
      Parameters:
      c - Course to be added to the allCourses HashMap

    • addModules

      public static void addModules(Module m)
      Parameters:
      m - Module to be added to the allModules HashMap.

    • clearMaps

      public static void clearMaps()
      Clears the allCourses and allModules HashMaps.

    • searchCourse

      public static Course searchCourse(String name)
      Parameters:
      name - A String containing the search key.
      Returns:
      Course The Course object corresponding with the search key.

    • searchModule

      public static Module searchModule(String name)
      Parameters:
      name - A String containing the search key.
      Returns:
      Module The Module object corresponding with the search key.

    • closeProgram

      public void closeProgram()
      Closes the program.
